segments.text: The kitchen's a mess with all that water spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's foot in the puddle—gross, it's probably cold and dirty now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, but everything's getting soaked around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet left on, what a sloppy mistake.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing the stool, hands in the cookie jar like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But with the wet floor, imagine slipping while doing that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, probably tracking water everywhere too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's widening, full of who knows what from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies might fall into the mess if they drop them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows a clean garden, making the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such avoidable filth building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dish towel's clean, but not for long in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whole place needs a good cleanup after this.
segments.speaker: PAR
